TEXT.TITLE: BIOSONICS INC <BIOS.O> PRESIDENT RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Biosonics Inc said Jeffrey S. Wigand has resigned as president, chief operating officer and director of the company. The company said Wigand will announce his affiliation with another healthcare company as soon as negotiations are completed. Reuter
